title: Cassie Ventura strips for provocative Instagram pregnancy photoshoot
text:
Cassie Ventura wasn't afraid to bare all in a sultry new Instagram shared online Monday.

The 33-year-old expecting mother stripped down to just fishnets and heels as she sat in front of a stone fireplace in the provocative 'BTS' shots.

Cassie, who was recently married to professional bull rider Alex Fine, was opted not to wear a top with only her long, flowing hair covering her intimate bits.

Modern mom: Cassie bared all in a sultry new pregnancy shoot shared on Instagram Monday

'When the shoot didn’t work out, but the BTS did,' she joked in the caption.

Cassie, who was the longtime girlfriend of Diddy, certainly captured a choice shot on her phone.

She offered a smoldering look at the camera while in full makeup.

Angled ever so slightly to conceal her modesty, the Me & U singer jutted one leg out seductively.

Though her outfit consisted of the bare minimum Cassie went all out with her tags, giving shout outs to stylist Marni Senofonte, makeup artist Rokael Lizama, hairstylist @TigerBahmb, and creatives Deonte' 'DeO' Nash, Hawa Arsala, and Fataah Dihaan.

Wedded bliss: Cassie and Alex Fine wed in late September

While Cassie was certainly not afraid to show off on Instagram, she put on a much more demure display in Instagram photos of her wedding to father of her child Fine last week.

The cover girl looked elegant as can be in a white off-the-shoulder look as she held a bouquet in front of her budding baby bump.

'Love you forever,' she captioned the photo.

No hard feelings: Diddy and Cassie (pictured in March last year) called it quits after 11 years together just eight months ago

The couple announced they are expecting their first child in June.

Cassie and previous beau Diddy called it quits after 11 years together just eight months ago, but there are no hard feelings as the rap legend sent a congratulatory message to the parents-to-be shortly after their baby announcement.

'Congratulations @Cassie and Alex,' the hit-maker, 49, wrote on Instagram. 'I wish you all nothing but love and happiness. God bless,' he continued.
description: The 33-year-old expecting mother stripped down to just fishnets and heels as she sat in front of a stone fireplace in the provocative 'BTS' shots. Cassie was recently wed to pro bullrider Alex Fine.
